messages.subject: Re:Happy Pi Day!
messages.msgSnippet: We did! DH made a bunch of little bitty pies on Pi Day (mini muffin sized tartlets) and we even took note of when it was 3:14 in the afternoon as well - we
messages.messageBody:
We did! DH made a bunch of little bitty pies on Pi Day (mini muffin
sized tartlets) and we even took note of when it was 3:14 in the
afternoon as well - we totally missed 1:59 (3.14159) We had lots of fun
with being silly about pi day.

Deb R

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Happy Pi Day!
messages.msgSnippet: Mmmmm, cobbler.  Can you cube a cobbler?   By the by, has anyone else caught the BBC documentary The Story of One , narrated by Terry Jones?  I would
messages.messageBody:
Mmmmm, cobbler.  Can you cube a cobbler?
 
By the by, has anyone else caught the BBC documentary "The Story of One", narrated by Terry Jones?  I would highly recommend to anybody for some fun math.  Even my daughter liked the marching animated ones.  (She was two at the time).
 
Tamara

--- On Sat, 3/14/09, Kelly Lovejoy <kbcdlovejo@...> wrote:

From: Kelly Lovejoy <kbcdlovejo@...>
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Happy Pi Day!
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, March 14, 2009, 10:34 AM






-----Original Message-----
From: griesellists <griesellists@ yahoo.com>

That said, fun strewing idea for tomorrow, 3/14: Bake a Pi! Pi are round.

-=-=-=-=-=-= -=-

Cobbler are square.

 ~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
"There is no single effort more radical in its potential for saving the world than a transformation of the way we raise our children." Marianne Williamson

messages.subject: Happy Pi Day!
messages.msgSnippet: A disclaimer.  I like math.  A lot.  It s fun for me. That said, fun strewing idea for tomorrow, 3/14:  Bake a Pi!  Pi are round. Tamara
messages.messageBody:
A disclaimer. I like math. A lot. It's fun for me.

That said, fun strewing idea for tomorrow, 3/14: Bake a Pi! Pi are round.

Tamara
